featured.text: At the moment EU tobacco manufacturers only have to put written health warnings on cigarette packets __(24)__

definition.zh_def: 煙草，一種植物，其葉子經過乾燥和加工後可用於製作香煙、雪茄和其他吸煙產品。
definition.en_def: A plant whose leaves are dried and processed to produce cigarettes, cigars, and other smoking products.
definition.example: Many people are trying to quit smoking tobacco for health reasons.
